scripts.dev: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx concurrently "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start" "npm run dev_database"
scripts.dev_database: surreal start --log debug --user root --pass root memory
scripts.connect_db: surreal sql --conn http://127.0.0.1:8000 --user root --pass root --ns app_db_development --db app_db
scripts.install: npx concurrently "cd frontend && npm run install" "cd server && npm run install" "cd shared && npm run install"
